author: Simon Difford
description: Depending on the ripeness of the plums, you may need to adjust the quantity of sugar.
name: Plum Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: CUT plum into quarters, remove stone and peel
MUDDLE plum in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
